List of Burmese films

This is a list of notable Burmese films.

1920s

  • Love and Liquor (1920) - First Burmese feature film

1930s

  • Taw Myine Kan (1932)
  • Sonema (1935)

1940s

  • Maung Tin Maung (1940)
  • Chit Thet Wai (1946)

1950s

  • Ludu Aung Than (1952)
  • Pyi Chit Thu (1955)
  • Mya Ganaing (1959)

Recent films

  • The Golden Land (2023)
  • The River Flows (2022)
  • The Ancient City (2021)

From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia
